Class BackgroundImage

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout
public class BackgroundImage extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Image
Represents a background image to be displayed on the stage. The background image fills the entire screen.

    Description

    Constructs a BackgroundImage using the specified image path.

  • Constructor Details

    • BackgroundImage

      public BackgroundImage(String imagePath)
      Constructs a BackgroundImage using the specified image path. The image is set to fill the entire parent area.
      Parameters:
      imagePath - The path to the background image.
